main-description: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our e-learning platform.
description-1: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, and password when you create an account. We also collect data about your usage of the platform, including courses your enroll in, progress, and interactions.
description-2: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, personalize your learning experience, and communicate with you about updates, promotions, and support.
description-3: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
description-4: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties except as required by law or to provide our services.
description-5: You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information at any time. You can also opt out of receiving promotional emails.
description-6: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
description-7: By using our platform, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
